text: Lɨci 21.2 Ais 52.1, 61.10, Ga 4.26, Ib 11.10, 11.16, 12.22, CHL 3.12, 21.10 Asɨ dɨ haiabɨla sebɨlɨ huaci sɨbaŋ agadɨ igin uami. Haiabɨla agadɨ ibi Jelusalem uami. Nɨbu Asɨ iahua hɨvɨ hɨnilalɨ heŋ hɨnia mɨgi uami. Iamɨgali muŋaŋ iahuben aba hajɨŋ huaci huaci agɨladɨ lamavɨla hɨniavɨlalɨ hameŋ agɨladɨ nudɨ hɨvɨ hajɨŋ lamɨci mɨgi uami.
